thought: To craft a red banner, I first need to craft the ingredients. The first ingredient is jungle planks which I already have in my inventory (slot 10), so I will first move a jungle wood into the crafting table to craft more planks. This will give me enough planks to craft the stick and red wool needed to make the banner.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_banner

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
